commitResults.messageTitle: Rename Duke class to Kobe and update greeting messages
Kobe: Echo user input and add farewell message on exit
commitResults.messageBody:
Echo each line of user input with border formatting.

Add a polite farewell message when
the user types "bye". This makes the termination behavior clearer and
improves user experience.

* Echo input lines with consistent border formatting
* Add farewell output before program termination

commitResults.messageTitle: Kobe: Store user input as tasks and display on request
commitResults.messageBody:
Add functionality to save any text entered by the user as a task.
Introduce the "list" command to display all stored tasks back to the
user.

Add a simple Task class with:
* immutable description
* completion flag (isDone) defaulting to false
* mark()/unmark() to toggle completion
* getStatusIcon() returning "X" or " "
* toString() rendering as "[X] <description>"

This provides the minimal domain model needed for storing and displaying
tasks consistently.

commitResults.messageTitle: Kobe: add task list with mark/unmark commands
commitResults.messageBody: Introduce task management to Kobe by storing tasks in an array of Task objects instead of raw strings. Supports adding tasks, listing them and toggling completion using mark N and unmark N.

commitResults.messageTitle: refactor: improve variable naming and enhance task list messages
refactor: replace array with ArrayList for task management and streamline task handling
feat: implement Deadline, Event, and Todo task classes for enhanced task management
feat: add Parser class for task input parsing and validation
Refactor UI handling into separate Ui class
Update text-UI test configuration for Kobe
